thread.title: Newly single Pete Wicks spotted getting very close to Chloe Sims during secret cigarette break
thread.title_full: Newly single Pete Wicks spotted getting very close to Chloe Sims during secret cigarette break

author: Emmeline Saunders
title: Newly single Pete Wicks spotted getting very close to Chloe Sims during secret cigarette break
text:
Newly single Pete Wicks spotted getting very close to Chloe Sims during secret cigarette break The two singletons cosied up to each other last night Share Chloe and Pete were spotted embracing (Photo: Rex) Share   
A newly single Pete Wicks was spotted cosying up to Chloe Sims during a secret cigarette break last night â€“ and something tells us Megan McKenna will NOT be happy when she sees them. 
The TOWIE co-stars were at a London hotel last night and were seen going for a crafty fag outside the building. 
Passers-by saw blonde Chloe hanging off Pete's neck with one arm encircling his shoulders. 
Chloe's eyes were closed and her lips were parted as the two embraced. Pete and Chloe pose with Lockie earlier in the evening (Photo: Rex Features) They were seen embracing and looking very cosy together (Photo: Rex Features) 
Pete, who seemed more than comfortable with the situation, looked directly into her eyes as she came closer, and they were then seen with their faces nearly touching. Chloe looked chic and stylish on her night out (Photo: Rex Features) Pete was spotted at the TRIC Awards with James Lock - with no Megan in sight (Photo: Rex Features) 
Neither Pete nor Chloe have publicly commented on the situation yet, although Pete did tweet last night to say he couldn't sleep. 
"Over an hour I've laid here in the dark, no phone, nothing...why the f**k can I never sleep?" he posted at 1.16am. 
While he's done nothing wrong, Megan is sure to object in the strongest possible terms to this latest TOWIE twist. Will Pete and Megan end their relationship on-screen? (Photo: ITV Picture Desk) 
She took to Twitter last night to blast Pete for reportedly saying he'd be going on Celebs Go Dating, adding that she'd stayed quiet about their split out of respect for him. 
"As he's been 'blabbing' and bragging about other Tv shows I will now confirm we are OVER and have been over for a while. End of the speculations. Now let me move on with my life. Thanks," she angrily posted. Chloe has previously counselled Megan on her relationship (Photo: FameFlynet) She comforted her during filming at Qube nightclub on March 8th (Photo: FameFlynet) 
In the previous three episodes of TOWIE's 20th series, viewers have watched as Pete and Megan struggle to cope with their tempers. 
And with Chloe deciding not to pursue a romance with Gatsby, she's now free and single to focus on other relationships. 
Could this lead to the most explosive TOWIE storyline yet? 
TOWIE returns tonight at 10pm on ITVBe. 
Mirror Celeb has contacted Chloe's team for comment. Like us on Facebook
